questions.question_text: What is the term used for the chemical process in which the rapid oxidation of fuel results in the production of heat?

options.A: Supplied to ensure that complete combustion has occurred = Excess air
options.B: Supplied from around the flames = Secondary air
options.C: Supplied to the combustion chamber in excess of the air required for perfect combustion = Excess air
options.D: Supplied to cool the hot vent gases = Dilution air
